text: Roy Lester Schneider (born May 13, 1939) is a physician in the United States Virgin Islands who was the fifth elected governor of that territory from January 5, 1995 to January 4, 1999. He was the fifth elected governor of that territory and the 26th overall. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Governors of the United States Virgin Islands Category:American physicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Roy L. Schneider
